6a89e691-963e-48fe-aab4-75dc8e25276c.description: The Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System, or WHMIS, incorporates global standards for hazard communication called the Globally Harmonized System (GHS). You'll learn how to understand labels, recognize hazards, and stay safe around dangerous materials. This course is for Canadian locations of Centerra Gold.
6a89e691-963e-48fe-aab4-75dc8e25276c.name: WHMIS

badge_template_activities.title: In 2015, Canada’s requirements for hazard classification and communication for workplace chemicals (Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System or WHMIS) were updated to incorporate the Globally Harmonized System of Classification and Labelling of Chemicals (GHS). These requirements are now known as WHMIS 2015.

eb4f0e2b-6a44-4522-a88f-0a6d9796f40d.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed the Work Safe | Home Safe Program created by Centerra Gold. This interactive program is central to Centerra Gold's Safety Leadership Culture and a mandatory learning objective for all employees throughout the organization.
eb4f0e2b-6a44-4522-a88f-0a6d9796f40d.name: Work Safe | Home Safe Program Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have completed the Work Safe | Home Safe Part 1 training online via Centerra Gold's learning management system. Content includes the importance of Good Communication, reflection on Why Safety is Important, Centerra's Safety Journey & Commitment to Safety, Safety Behaviors, Safety Culture, Core Values, Safety Behaviors, and Stop Conversations. Earners have also completed the necessary Check-Point which includes completion and uploading of a STOP Conversation assignment. (Completion: 1hr)

Earners have completed the Work Safe | Home Safe Part 2 training online via Centerra Gold's learning management system. Content includes Hazard Identification, Tools for Safety, the Cost of Safety, and personal Safety Commitments. Earners have also completed the necessary Check-Point which includes completion and uploading of a Safety Commitment assignment. (Completion: 1 hr)

Earners have completed the live Work Safe | Home Safe session (online or in person) delivered by a certified WS|HS Facilitator. This three-hour session engages participants in discussion and reflection of the content covered and key learning outcomes of the online modules of Part 1 & 2. (Completion: 3 hrs)

skills.name: Importance Of Communication For Maintaining A Safe Workplace

495e5a42-6d6c-42dd-b9f3-faf1e095d56e.description: Bu rozeti almaya hak kazananlar, Centerra Gold tarafından oluşturulan İşte Güvenlik Evde Güvenlik Programını başarıyla tamamlamıştır. Bu etkileşimli program, Centerra Gold'un İş Güvenliği Liderliği Kültürü'nün merkezinde yer alır ve şirket genelindeki tüm çalışanlar için tamamlanması zorunlu bir eğitimdir.
495e5a42-6d6c-42dd-b9f3-faf1e095d56e.name: İşte Güvenlik | Evde Güvenlik Program Katılım

badge_template_activities.title: İşte Güvenlik Evde Güvenlik Programının1. Bölümünü Centerra Gold eğitim platformu aracılığıyla çevrimiçi olarak tamamlamıştır.İçerikte, Sağlıklı İletişimin Önemi, İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliğinin Öneminin Nedenleri, Centerra'nın İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği Yolculuğu ve İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği Taahhüdü, İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği Davranışları, İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği Kültürü, Temel Değerler, İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği Davranışları ve Dur Konuşmaları Üzerine Derinlemesine Düşünme gibi temel konular yer almaktadır
Çalışanlar ayrıca İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği taahhüdünü imzalayarak sisteme yüklemelerini gerektiren bir ara değerlendirme oturumuna katılırlar. (Süre: 1 saat)

İşte Güvenlik Evde Güvenlik Programının 2. Bölümünü Centerra Gold eğitim platformu aracılığıyla çevrimiçi olarak tamamlarlar. İçerikte Tehlikeyi Tanımlama, İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği Araçları, İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği Maliyeti ve kişisel İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği Taahhütleri yer almaktadır. Çalışanlar ayrıca İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği taahhüdünü imzalayarak sisteme yüklemelerini gerektiren bir ara değerlendirme oturumuna katılırlar. (Süre: 1 saat)

İşte Güvenlik Evde Güvenlik Programının sertifikalı bir WSIHS oturum yöneticisi tarafından verilen canlı oturumu (çevrimiçi veya yüzyüze) tamamlarlar. Bu üç saatlik oturumda katılımcılardan 1. ve 2. bölümün çevrimiçi modüllerinde işlenen içerik ve temel kazanımları üzerine derinlemesine düşünmeleri ve tartışmaları beklenir. (Süre: 3 saat)

skills.name: İç İş Sağlığı Ve Güvenliği Sorumluluk Sistemi
İş Sağlığı Ve Güvenliği Liderinin Davranış Modelleri
Sürdürülebilir İş Güvenliği İçin İletişimin Önemi

d746ada5-8c57-43e6-84ce-43af851f2dae.description: Earners of this badge have worked for at least 5 consecutive years at a division of Centerra Gold.
d746ada5-8c57-43e6-84ce-43af851f2dae.name: 5 Years of Service

0535b0b0-11f4-4f5c-a6fa-5136eaf3ffe5.description: The Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA) was enacted to expand the government’s mission to offer full accessibility to all disabled Ontarians by 2025. This program covers basic information about AODA, comprehensive details about its standards, and the benefits they offer Ontarians.
0535b0b0-11f4-4f5c-a6fa-5136eaf3ffe5.name: AODA

badge_template_activities.title: The Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act, 2005 (AODA) is an Ontario law mandating that organizations must follow standards to become more accessible to people with disabilities. The goal for the province is to be fully accessible by 2025. All levels of government, private sectors, and non-profits must comply with this legislation.

skills.name: Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act

6c447004-58b2-47e9-8832-8f695dc1c1d9.description: Earners of this badge have been deemed to have successfully completed the requisite DDI facilitated modules, group check-ins, and independent course work associated with the Leadership Program at Centerra Gold. This credential confirms recipients have successfully demonstrated understanding and competency in the key learning areas, as well as aptitude in applying this acquired learning on the job as a leader of people.
6c447004-58b2-47e9-8832-8f695dc1c1d9.name: Leadership Development

alignments.name: Continuing Professional Development - CPA Ontario
alignments.description: Centerra Gold's Strategic Leadership Development Program aligns to the CPD requirements for ongoing professional development activities associated with continuing education: Participation in a course, webinar, conference or seminar. Hours spent attending each module qualify as CPD hours.

alignments.name: Continuing Professional Development - HRPA
alignments.description: Centerra Gold's Strategic Leadership Development Program aligns to the CPD requirements for ongoing professional development activities that can be earned through continuing education including seminars, workshops and conferences. Hours spent attending each module qualify as CPD hours .

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a minimum of 5 of the 6 courses included in the Strategic Leadership Program

Occupy a position within Centerra Gold that has responsibility for leading professionals (e.g. direct reporting structure) or influences others in order to achieve results (e.g. through project management)

skills.name: Executing Strategy At The Front Line

620faddc-9f96-42d1-b16b-510faad48f2c.description: Bu Rozeti alanlar, Centerra Gold'un İşte Güvenlik Evde Güvenlik Programı için özel olarak belirlenmiş Eğitimcini Eğitimi kursunu başarıyla tamamlamıştır.
620faddc-9f96-42d1-b16b-510faad48f2c.name: İşte Güvenlik | Evde Güvenlik Eğitimcinin Eğitimi

badge_template_activities.title: Work Safe | Home Safe Program Completion

Centerra Gold'un İşte Güvenlik Evde Güvenlik Programının çevrimiçi eğitimi kolaylaştırmak ve çevrimiçi atölye çalışmalarının teknolojik boyutlarının zorlukları konusunda farkındalık yaratmak gibi alanları için gerekli görülen yeterliliği göstererek, eğitimcinin eğitimi kursunu tamamlamıştır. Başarılı eğitimciler, sürekli gelişim bağlamında gözlemlenmiş, değerlendirilmiş ve bir eğitim uzmanından koçluk desteği almıştır.
Centerra Gold'un İşte Güvenlik Evde Güvenlik Eğitimini sanal ortamda vermek üzere atanmış, yetkin eğitim uzmanları tarafından gözlemlenmiş ve değerlendirilmiştir.

897747d5-d509-4687-8ce2-c082354947bd.description: Earners of this badge have have been deemed an approved Account Administrator of the Bridge Learning Management System at Centerra Gold Inc., having successfully completed all required and recommended training and learning content through the Bridge platform in addition to having demonstrated a high degree of skill, aptitude and accuracy in applying this acquired learning on the job.
897747d5-d509-4687-8ce2-c082354947bd.name: Learning Management System (LMS) Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Bridge training content in Centerra's Learning Library, including but not limited to: 1. What is Bridge; 2. Overview for Learners; 3. Learning in Bridge - 5 Tips; 4. Manage Courses; 5. Author Training; 6. Manage Live Trainings; 7. Learning in Bridge: Overview; 8. Admin Training; 9. Manage Groups; 10. Roles and Permissions; 11. Employee Development Overview for Employees; 12. Managing Reports; 13. Seven Course Design Wins for Bridge; 14. Orientation for Account (Site) Administrators
Demonstrate proficiency in navigating, utilizing and maintaining the Bridge Talent Management System.

f8e49ce3-c64d-49d0-ad5d-63136a9be968.description: The 5-Day Training is for people who investigate low-to-medium risk incidents, precursor incidents and, perhaps, major incidents (serious injuries, fatalities, major facility upsets, fires and explosions, or significant environmental releases). The course covers the essential TapRooT® Techniques (SnapCharT®, Safeguards Analysis, the Root Cause Tree®, and the Corrective Action Helper®), and the optional tools (Change Analysis, CHAP, and Equifactor®) that are used in a complex investigation.
f8e49ce3-c64d-49d0-ad5d-63136a9be968.name: TapRooT® Advanced Root Cause Analysis Team Leader Training

badge_template_activities.title: The course covers advanced interviewing and information collection techniques and techniques to improve human performance. In addition, learn proactive use of the TapRooT® System. There are frequent exercises using the TapRooT® Software so that attendees leave with the effective practice of the skills they will apply when they get back to work.

Centerra Gold'un İşte Güvenlik Evde Güvenlik Programını tamamlamışlardır,çevrimiçi eğitimi kolaylaştırmak ve oturum yöneticisi olarak sorunları verimli bir şekilde çözerek çevrimiçi atölye çalışmalarının sorunsuz bir şekilde tamamlamak için gerekli teknolojik yeterlilikleri kazanarak, oturum yöneticisi eğitimini başarıyla tamamlamıştır.
İşte Güvenlik Evde Güvenlik Eğitimi kapsamında bir oturum yöneticisinden beklenen görevleri yerine getirme konusunda yetkin, atanmış bir eğitim uzmanı tarafından gözlemlenmiş ve değerlendirilmiştir.

07d28da4-0653-4656-9637-97aca51f2288.description: The Industrial Supervisor Program is a 4-day interactive training session designed and facilitated by CanScott, training professionals in the mining and natural resources space. This program covers curriculum that is generally applicable throughout North America and tailored to specific audiences: legislation, industry examples, and company-specific content serving to ensure minimum legislative compliance obligations and supervisor competencies are achieved while enhancing on the job performance
07d28da4-0653-4656-9637-97aca51f2288.name: Industrial Supervisor Program

badge_template_activities.title: Participants gain core knowledge and skills required to transition from an individual contributor role to a leader. For existing leaders, it provides a refresher of legislative obligations, company expectations, and reiteration of best practices. This training ensures that new front line leaders are competent under the law, ensuring that they fully understand their legal obligations as well as the company's expectations, and can apply them consistently on the job.

Following an exam, this program also includes customized examples and site-specific scenarios, along with the integration of core competencies identified by Centerra Gold as essential to leadership success. Each participant completes post-training observation and receives coaching by CanScott facilitators to ensure knowledge transfer of course content and application on the job.
